description.default: Thank you for your interest in participating in OurHealth. To get started, please answer these questions to make sure you’re eligible to participate.
description.es: Gracias por su interés en participar en OurHealth. Para comenzar, responda estas preguntas para asegurarse de que es elegible para participar.
description.dev: DEV_Thank you for your interest in participating in OurHealth. To get started, please answer these questions to make sure you’re eligible to participate.

title.default: I identify as having South Asian ancestry from one or more of these countries: Bangladesh, Bhutan, India, the Maldives, Nepal, Pakistan, or Sri Lanka.
title.es: Me identifico con ascendencia del sur de Asia de uno o más de estos países: Bangladesh, Bután, India, Maldivas, Nepal, Pakistán o Sri Lanka.
title.dev: DEV_I identify as having South Asian ancestry from one or more of these countries: Bangladesh, Bhutan, India, the Maldives, Nepal, Pakistan, or Sri Lanka.

title.default: I am comfortable reading or speaking English.
title.es: Me siento cómodo leyendo o hablando inglés.
title.dev: DEV_I am comfortable reading or speaking English.

title.default: I am 18 years old or older.
title.dev: DEV_I am 18 years old or older.

title.default: I live in the United States.
title.dev: DEV_I live in the United States.

title.default: Who are you enrolling in the study?
title.dev: DEV_Who are you enrolling in the study?

description.default: Please choose the correct response. If you are enrolling both yourself and your child/dependent, please first complete the enrollment for yourself and later you can add your dependent
description.es: Por favor elija la respuesta correcta. Si se está inscribiendo usted y su hijo/dependiente, primero complete la inscripción usted mismo y luego podrá agregar a su dependiente.
description.dev: DEV_Please choose the correct response. If you are enrolling both yourself and your child/dependent, please first complete the enrollment for yourself and later you can add your dependent

text.default: I am enrolling on behalf of my child / my legal dependent.
text.es: Me inscribo en nombre de mi hijo/mi dependiente legal.
text.dev: DEV_I am enrolling on behalf of my child / my legal dependent.
